comment: I'm just so sad to hear this. I've been reading all morning about him. My heart is just breaking. Sending love & prayers!!
amr:
# ::snt I'm just so sad to hear this. I've been reading all morning about him. My heart is just breaking. Sending love & prayers!!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / sad-02
            :ARG0 (h / hear-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (t / this))
            :ARG1 ii
            :mod (j / just)
            :degree (s2 / so))
      :snt2 (r / read-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i
                  :part (h2 / heart))
            :ARG3 (h3 / he)
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (m2 / morning)
                  :mod (a / all)))
      :snt3 (b / break-heart-31
            :ARG1 h2
            :mod (j2 / just))
      :snt4 (s3 / send-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (l / love-01)
                  :op2 (a3 / amp))
            :snt5 (p / pray-01)))
